name: The Green Knight
description:
"A drowsy summer fire, the gentle breeze of the wind, a night that asks for merriment."
Kay asks Gawaine to share one story. Gawaine rises to meet the challenge.

Written for inkle's "Pendragon: Campfire Tales" competition. 
It is high time that I try and familiarize myself with INK. Please enjoy my first foray!
